Title: Businessman accuses Zamfara govt of illegal demolition of property
Summary: Zamfara State Urban and Rural Planning Board (ZURPB) is accused of illegally taking advantage of Zamfari's decision to take advantage of the law . The board has been accused of making illegal decisions without authorisation . Zamfarani says he will continue to pursue the case against him .

Title: US Air Force staff sentenced for sharing defense info on dating app
Summary: David Slater, 64, a retired US Army lieutenant colonel, pleaded guilty in the case . Slater, a former civilian employee of the US Air Force, was sentenced to nearly six years in prison on Wednesday .

Title: ‘Over ₦600b TETFund unused funds trapped in CBN’
Summary: The immediate past President of the Academic Staff Union of Universities (ASUU), Prof. Emmanuel Osodeke, has raised concern that over ₦600 billion in unutilised Tertiary Education Trust Fund (TETFund) allocations remain idle in the Central Bank .

Title: Atiku joins as Sowore names date for Aso Rock march for Nnamdi Kanu’s release
Summary: Atiku Abubakar has joined Omoyele Sowore's campaign for the release of the leader of the Indigenous People of Biafra (IPOB), Nnamdi Kanu . In a post on his official X account on Wednesday, Atiku posted a picture of the former vice president .

Title: Zidane’s son Luca ‘proud’ to play for Algeria
Summary: Luca Zidane turned out for France’s youth team but has chosen to play for Algeria . The 27-year-old says he is ‘proud’ to represent Algeria ahead of the World Cup qualifier against Somalia .

Title: Reps move to regulate private intelligence sector, strengthen national security
Summary: Reps move to regulate private intelligence sector, strengthen national security . “We believe that the quality of governance improves when citizens, experts, and stakeholders actively participate in lawmaking”

Title: I didn’t feel good about Faith’s disqualification – Sultana
Summary: BBNaija Season 10 housemate, Sultana has opened up about her feelings regarding the disqualification of fellow contestant Faith . She described the incident as disappointing and emotionally unsettling .

Title: Canadian national dies in Lagos hotel room
Summary:
Police sources said no marks of violence were found on the deceased’s body

Title: Strike: FG too slow in meeting our demands  —  ASUU President
Summary: Piwuna said the government only reached out when ASUU threatened to begin industrial action, adding that the lack of timely engagement has become a recurring challenge .

Title: US faces travel delays as government shutdown wears on
Summary: US faces travel delays as government shutdown wears on . Concerns over flight delays and missed paychecks due to the US government shutdown escalated Wednesday . Senators rejected yet another bid to end the standoff .
